document_data.name: Goldsmithers' Guild
document_data.mainbody: The '''Goldsmithers' Guild''' was located in [[Almorel]] on the [[Lake of Mists]] in the [[Hordelands]] in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Base of Operations: The guild headquarters was located near the center of Almorel along the [[Golden Way]] next to the [[Temple of Chauntea (Almorel)|Temple of Chauntea]].
document_data.Organization: The Goldsmithers' Guild head guildmaster in {{Yearlink|1357}} was the [[dwarf]] [[Jaco Tirst]].
